head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HEILBRUN, HELEN S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HEILBRUN, HELEN S.

block.p: HEILBRUN-Helen S. August 1, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Norman Heilbrun and the late Morten E. Kapp. Devoted mother of Barbara (Paul Mitarachi) Kapp, Roberta (William) Harris and Peter (Robyn) Heilbrun. Loving grandmother of Andrew (Lori), Stuart (Constance) and Jeffrey Kapp, Marta Heilbrun, Sarah Kate Heilbrun, David Harris and Benjamin (Hillary) Harris. Loving greatgrandmother of McKenzie Kapp and Crosby Kapp. Loving sister of Joseph Simons. A memorial service will be held at the convenience of the family with date and time to be announced later this year. In lieu of flowers donations to Temple Beth Zion or Buffalo Philharmonic Orchestra. Amherst Memorial Chapel, Inc.
